member.name: M:Visionscape.Display.Runtime.QueueView.SaveAllImages(System.String,Visionscape.Steps.EnumImgFileType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves all of the images in the InspectionReportList to disk. File names are assigned automatically. File Name format is: InspectionSymbolicName_snapshotindex_cyclecount
member.param: The folder where the images should be saved
Specifies the type of image to save, TIF or BMP
If true, a dialog will display the name of the first image file to be saved
